plot: A bookmaker's daughter is adopted by a widow and loves a captain whose winner is disqualified by a crooked Lord.
title: A Member of Tattersall's
plot_es: A bookmaker's daughter is adopted by a widow and loves a captain whose winner is disqualified by a crooked Lord.
plot_en: A bookmaker's daughter is adopted by a widow and loves a captain whose winner is disqualified by a crooked Lord.
